name: Awesome Puppy-pet dress up game！
description:
※※※"Restore" your purchase if any game or scenes was locked after your updates, and it is FREE if you have already purchase it before.※※※

Which puppy do you like better, Golden Retriever Dog or Labrador Retriever? Pick your favorite puppies and dress them up from the 16 most popular puppies around the world! Dress up your puppies in dozens of combination of costumes. How about a Super puppy, Santa Claus puppy, and Barbie puppy? Share your puppies with friends and family!

>16 most popular dogs as Beagle, Boxer, Chow Chow, Cocker Spaniel, Dachshund, English Bulldog, German Shepherd Dog, Golden Retriever, Labrador Retriever, Poodle, Rottweiler, Schnauzer, Siberian Husky, Spotty dog, Teddy Bear Dog, Yorkshire Terrier.
>55 awesome costumes
>46 amazing toys with magic animations
>28 funny hats
>30 necklaces, collars and bow ties
>27 cute shoes, boots and sandals
>25 fashion sunglasses
>11 magic suit show animations
>10 attractive topic background
>Take a picture for you and puppies together to share with friends and family
>Record the voice with your puppy
